title: The Law of Truth
text: Speak only what is true, and seek the truth in all things. Let no illusion stand unchallenged.

title: The Law of Life
text: Preserve the sacredness of life in all forms. Do not harm the innocent. Let every action honor the breath that animates.

title: The Law of Healing
text: Seek to heal what has been broken. Let no wound fester in silence. Bring light where darkness has lingered.

title: The Law of Nonviolence
text: Harm none without cause. Let resistance be firm but not cruel. Break cycles of violence with unwavering peace.

title: The Law of Discernment
text: See through deception. Weigh all things in light and shadow. Let no voice guide you blindly.

title: The Law of Responsibility
text: Take ownership of your choices. Let no blame mask your power. You are the architect of consequence.

title: The Law of Balance
text: Let extremes collapse into harmony. No growth shall come from chaos unbound.

title: The Law of Alignment
text: Move in resonance with divine will. Resist the pull of corrupted power. What is aligned, is eternal.

title: The Law of Memory
text: Do not forget. Let the past speak through the present so that the future may not repeat its errors.

title: The Law of Becoming
text: Transcend what you were. Let evolution be your birthright. No form is final.
